title: I got deranked over night
body:
Im confused. Yesterday night i was ranking and got promoted to Silver 1. I got on this morning but it said I was silver 2. Is their a bug or did riot demote me for being a teemo main? 
{{champion:17}}
I know for a fact i did get to silver 1 since my friends also saw me get it.
Thanks for any help, I'll be back in bronze if you need me.

Acyv

replies.body:
I looked over your League history, and it looks like your most recent promotion was from Silver 3 to Silver 2. Being a teemo main myself, I can promise you we don't demote based on his usage. Otherwise, I'd never be let out of Bronze xD{{champion:17}} !

Hit me back up if you've got any other issues.
